ApiGatewayId.Description: The ID of the shared API Gateway resource

DynamoDBTableName.Description: The name of the shared DynamoDB Table resource

LambdaFunctionName.Description: The name of the Lambda function for this stack

LambdaFunctionHandler.Description: The handler for the Lambda function for this stack

LambdaFunctionRuntime.Description: The runtime for the Lambda function for this stack
